item.title: Comment on Like The Rain? There’s a Website For You by Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:

Very appropriate. You must be excited about today's upcoming storm :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Moria.

Very appropriate. You must be excited about today’s upcoming storm :-)

In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3778/comment-page-1#comment-2013710">Roman Govsheev</a>.
Never! I love the sun. Some people say it's weird because my birthday is in January :)

Never! I love the sun. Some people say it’s weird because my birthday is in January :)

item.title: Comment on My 22nd Prodigy Show – Moscow, Russia, 09-Nov-2016 by Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3404/comment-page-1#comment-2013686">Rom</a>.
Thanks a lot, Rom :D This all started back 2009, when I saw them 4 times over a 2-week timespan. Sometimes it seems like craziness to me, but it's so much fun that I can't stop :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rom.

Thanks a lot, Rom :D
This all started back 2009, when I saw them 4 times over a 2-week timespan. Sometimes it seems like craziness to me, but it’s so much fun that I can’t stop :)

item.title: Comment on My 22nd Prodigy Show – Moscow, Russia, 09-Nov-2016 by Rom
item.dc:creator: Rom
item.description: Dude, good to see you enjoying Prodigy all around the world! I wish you had more time to tour around :)
item.content:encoded: Dude, good to see you enjoying Prodigy all around the world! I wish you had more time to tour around :)

item.title: Comment on Happy Birthday To Me, I’m 39 by Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3290/comment-page-1#comment-2013678">Albert (Alik)</a>.
Thanks a lot, man :) I can't wait to tell people about what we do as soon as we're out of stealth mode. My current diet is now mostly vegan, and I'm not even vegetarian (I do eat some meat occasionally). I'll write about it soon, hopefully.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Albert (Alik).

Thanks a lot, man :)
I can’t wait to tell people about what we do as soon as we’re out of stealth mode.
My current diet is now mostly vegan, and I’m not even vegetarian (I do eat some meat occasionally). I’ll write about it soon, hopefully.

item.title: Comment on Happy Birthday To Me, I’m 39 by Albert (Alik)
item.dc:creator: Albert (Alik)
item.description: Wish you a happy BDay and indeed it seems my wishes are coming true :) Regarding the site, `Contact Us` is the new `under construction`? ;) Curious as to your new Diet. Hope it contains zero animal suffering... All the best.
item.content:encoded:
Wish you a happy BDay and indeed it seems my wishes are coming true :)
Regarding the site, `Contact Us` is the new `under construction`? ;)
Curious as to your new Diet. Hope it contains zero animal suffering…
All the best.
